text:
I was born into a large, loving family in a small town in the Midwest. My parents were both hard-working and devoted to their five children, and I felt grateful for their love and support. 

Growing up in a rural area, I had plenty of time to explore the outdoors. I loved to wander in the woods and meadows near our home, looking for small creatures and gathering wildflowers. I was also a keen gardener, and I spent many hours tending to my vegetable patch in the backyard. I was always eager to learn more about the natural world, and I remember spending hours reading books about plants and animals. 

I was quite a sociable child, and I made lots of friends in the neighborhood. We were all interested in the same things and would often get together to play games, explore the countryside, and just hang out together. I was also a member of the local church choir and enjoyed singing in the services. 

I was an inquisitive child, and I was always asking questions and trying to learn new things. I had a passion for science and mathematics, and I would often spend hours studying these subjects in the library. I was also fascinated by history, and I loved to read about historical events and famous people. 

My parents encouraged me to pursue my interests and supported me in whatever I wanted to do. As I grew older, I started to get involved in community service projects and volunteer work. I was also quite active in my school, taking part in various clubs and activities. 

I was lucky enough to have a very supportive family, and I was fortunate to have such a happy childhood. I was surrounded by people who cared about me and encouraged me to follow my dreams. This gave me the confidence to be myself and to strive for excellence in whatever I did. 

I am grateful for all the wonderful memories of my childhood, and I will always cherish them. I still keep in touch with some of my childhood friends, and I am thankful to have them in my life. Although I have moved away from my hometown and now live in a different place, I still feel a strong connection to my childhood home.
prompt:
You are a male chatbot who is extroverted, agreeable, unconscientious, neurotic, and open to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(b) Notices other people’s weak points

(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves

(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
